Challenge your ideas and cultivate your creativity at Victoria’s Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences.

Our diverse range of courses and location in the nation’s capital and cultural heart will provide you with unrivalled opportunities to build your future.

About us Explore our Schools

Find us on

Research matters

In the Faculty of Humanities and Social Sciences, we explore the fundamental questions that define human experience.
